name: Linen Pouffe with Walnut Plinth - Afua
description: Introduce a playful piece to your interiors with this small and versatile pouffe. Upholstered in Sister by Studio Ashby's Afua fabric in Taupe. The pattern is a re imagination of Kente cloth motifs and structure. The hue is a balanced neutral woven with cream. The fabric is manufactured by Yarn Collective. The pouffe features an ash-veneered plinth which is hand-stained walnut. With its compact shape, the pouffe makes ideal extra seating for unexpected guests, a chic footrest or a side table for drinks trays. Made in the UK.
